extendedInfo.description: Do you want to spy on someone without getting caught? The Stealth Camcorder is one of its kind app. Features - 1. Disguised. So when you are video recording someone, person behind you won't come to know at all. 2. Two disguise screens provided. 3. Also records voice.The recorded files are stored on your SD card. For any issues, write us. Please do not put stupid comments in the comments section, we cannot respond there.

reviews.comment: Basically a ripoff. No way to get refund.
reviews.author: A Google User
